name: @create-figma-plugin/utilities
description: Utility functions for common Figma plugin operations
author: Yuan Qing Lim

scripts.build: yarn run clean-build && tsc --module es2020 --moduleResolution node
scripts.clean: yarn run clean-build && yarn run clean-test
scripts.test: tsc -b && yarn run clean-test && tap 'test/**/*.ts' --coverage-report html --coverage-report text --no-browser --reporter terse
